# etcdv2_user (Resource)

Manages an etcdv2 user.

## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "etcdv2_user" "developer" {
  username = "dev_user"
  password = var.dev_password
  roles = [
    etcdv2_role.app_readonly.name,
    etcdv2_role.monitoring.name
  ]
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `password` (String, Sensitive) The password for the etcd user.
- `username` (String) The username for the etcd user.

### Optional

- `roles` (List of String) List of roles assigned to the user.

## Import

Import is supported using the following syntax:

```shell
terraform import etcdv2_user.developer dev_user
```
